description: Retrieves a paginated list of asset summaries. You can use this operation to do the following: You can't use this operation to list all assets. To retrieve summaries for all of your assets, use ListAssetModels to get all of your asset model IDs. Then, use ListAssets to get all assets for each asset model.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for each paginated request. Default: 50

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter for the requested list of assets. Choose one of the following options: ALL --- The list includes all assets for a given asset model ID. The assetModelId parameter is required if you filter by ALL. TOP_LEVEL --- The list includes only top-level assets in the asset hierarchy tree. Default: ALL.

nested_items.name: assetSummaries
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the asset, which has the following format.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the asset.

nested_items.name: assetModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset model used to create this asset.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current status of the asset.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: details
nested_items.description: A list of detailed errors.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: hierarchies
nested_items.description: A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a hierarchyId. A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the hierarchy. This ID is a hierarchyId.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The hierarchy name provided in the CreateAssetModel or UpdateAssetModel API operation.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the hierarchy, if it has one. When you update an asset hierarchy, you may assign an external ID if it doesn't already have one. You can't change the external ID of an asset hierarchy that already has one. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the asset.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
